title: Directs municipal police training council to establish policies and procedures for police officers, relating to investigation of and intervention into sex offenses
actClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to directing the municipal police training council to establish policies and procedures for the investigation of sex offenses and intervention by police officers into the commission of such offenses; and to amend the judiciary law, in relation to providing training for judges and justices on crimes involving sexual assault
